sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtccmmnclcode ( CL_CODE /* 분류코드 */ , CL_CODE_NM /* */ , CL_CODE_DC /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #clCode# /* 분류코드 */ , #clCodeNm# /* */ , #clCodeDc# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtccmmnclcode SET CL_CODE=#clCode# /* 분류코드 */ , CL_CODE_NM=#clCodeNm# /* */ , CL_CODE_DC=#clCodeDc# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE CL_CODE=#clCode# /* 분류코드 */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtccmmnclcode WHERE CL_CODE=#clCode# /* 분류코드 */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CL_CODE /* 분류코드 */ , CL_CODE_NM /* */ , CL_CODE_DC /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtccmmnclcode WHERE CL_CODE=#clCode# /* 분류코드 */

SELECT CL_CODE /* 분류코드 */ , CL_CODE_NM /* */ , CL_CODE_DC /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtccmmnclcode WHERE 1=1
CL_CODE = #searchKeyword# /* 분류코드 */
CL_CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CL_CODE DESC /* 분류코드 */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtccmmnclcode WHERE 1=1
CL_CODE = #searchKeyword# /* 분류코드 */
CL_CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
